about.title: About Suntop AI
paragraphs: We are a company focused on deep AI application in dialysis. Through our proprietary dialysis management system, combined with customized LLMs, AI Agents and IoT technology, we upgrade traditional experience-dependent dialysis treatment into a smarter, more automated, personalized, safer and more efficient intelligent dialysis system.

Starting from the data source, we've made all core dialysis room equipment IoT-enabled—dialysis machines, BP monitors, scales. We've connected 3,000+ dialysis devices, achieving structured data capture throughout the entire treatment process, deeply integrated with hospital HIS and LIS systems.

On this foundation, we've built a dialysis-specific customized LLM and proprietary AI Agent decision system, forming a complete chain from data collection, analysis, evaluation, recommendations to real-time feedback.

The system continuously provides decision support to physicians during treatment, including prescription adjustment recommendations, volume and ultrafiltration assessment, and prediction and warning of high-risk events like hypotension. These recommendations are not post-hoc analysis, but exist in real-time within the physician's workflow.
